Name: Castle Rencounter
About the game: Who thought to put the fortress so close to each other? Now we have no choice. We'll have to destroy the enemy outpost! What? These insolent decided to defend themselves and gather an army? How? Is their army going on the offensive? Can not be! Well, in this case, act, my lord. Smash the enemies and destroy their stronghold! Motherland will not forget you and the King will reward you generously for the victory! Fascinating clicker Dozens dynamic levels Several types of combat units Ability to choose different tactics
